FOUND IN: Anorexia (either the condition or its root term "anorexia nervosa")
Epee (fencing term, but a duelling weapon in some contexts)
Disagree (to take issue with someone's opinion or belief)
Hercule Poirot (primary character written by Dame Agatha Christie)
Quarter sections (used in the U.S., a quarter section is one-fourth of a square mile or approximately 640 acres, roughly equivalent to the size of a township section).
